boardgame.description: Werewolves of Miller's Hollow is a game that takes place in a small village which is haunted by werewolves. Each player is secretly assigned a role - Werewolf, Ordinary Townsfolk, or special character such as The Sheriff, The Hunter, the Witch, the Little Girl, The Fortune Teller and so on... There is also a Moderator player who controls the flow of the game. The game alternates between night and day phases. At night, the Werewolves secretly choose a Villager to kill. During the day, the Villager who was killed is revealed and is out of the game. The remaining Villagers (normal and special villagers alike) then deliberate and vote on a player they suspect is a Werewolf, helped (or hindered) by the clues the special characters add to the general deliberation. The chosen player is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;lynched_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, reveals his/her role and is out of the game. Werewolf is a social game that requires no equipment to play, and can accommodate almost any large group of players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Werewolves of Miller's Hollow/les Loups-Garous de Thiercelieux/Die Werw_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ouml;lfe von D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;sterwald is a published version arranged by Hervé Marly and Philippe des Pallières and published by Lui-même, 2001 for 8-23 players. This has been nominated for the 2003 Spiel des Jahres award._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Werewolves of Miller's Hollow is a separate game from Werewolf, and was split from that entry at the request of Asmodee._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

Asmodée (ASM KG01US) The tiny town of Millers Hollow is stunned by the discovery that it harbors werewolves, who, under the cover of darkness, kidnap and devour townsfolk. The townsfolk have organized to unmask any of their neighbors that are really monsters-by-night... then lynch the beasts to remove their evil presence from their quiet little town forever. To discover who the fiends are, a meeting is called, bringing together all of the townsfolk including some remarkable characters - such as the town psychic, a group of local hunters, as well as two lovers, a police captain and a nosey little girl. This diverse group will lead the inquiry, and decide the ultimate fate of the town... But... ssh!!... As night falls, close your eyes and be very quiet. The werewolves may come and take you if you aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t careful.

KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. The Werewolves of Miller_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Hollow - $10.40 Availability: DIRECT ORDER - In stock at our supplier. *** Usually ships in 1-2 weeks ***. If you place an order, we will include the game in our next order from our supplier* *Next order date - to see our next order date click on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link. If the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link is not visible, click on the user ID _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;kkrieger_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; to view our _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;geekstore_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;, then click on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link for a specific game. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country -- there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! For Canadian orders, we ship with Canada Post and charge a flat rate for one game (based on your province, see below) + $1.50 for each additional game (up to a maximum of an additional $6). e.g. The 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th games ship for $1.50 each, all subsequent games ship for free. Metro Vancouver area $8.50 (1 business day) or $0.00* Victoria (South Vancouver Island) $10 (2 business days) BC $12 (2 business days) AB $13 (2 business days) SK $13 (3 business days) MB $14 (3 business days) ON $15 (4 business days) QC $15 (5 business days) PE,NB,NS $15 (7 business days) NL $17 (8 business days) YT $17 (5 business days) NU/NT/Remote areas $17 (up to 13 business days) *FREE local pick-up in Vancouver area. US Orders are shipped USPS from zipcode 98230. International Orders are shipped USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PROMOTIONS: Loyalty rewards: For every $50 of games on your order, receive a $2.50 credit to be used on a future order. PAYMENT METHODS: We accept the following forms of payment: 1. Interac e-Transfer* (Canadian banks) 2. Cash on delivery (local pick-up greater Vancouver area) 3. PayPal (Instant Transfer or debit/credit card funded) 4. Credit cards (processed by PayPal - your information is never shared with us) 5. Money Order - we will accept postal money orders, but will not ship games until money order is received and cashed. Our prices include a discount for paying cash or another no fee method (1-2 above). All payments processed by PayPal (3-4 above) will incur an extra charge of $0.30 + 2.9% to pass on the exact processing costs charged to us by PayPal. International payments through PayPal are $0.30 + 3.9%. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com

Asmodee (ASMKG01US) Can you find the werewolves before it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s too late? The tiny hamlet of Millers Hollow is beset by monstrous enemies hidden in their midst. Organize the townsfolk and uncover the evil in disguise, so that you can kill the beasts before they claim the entire town, and bring eternal silence to the town forever. Distrust and suspicion run rampant - can you root out the werewolves and save your town, or will you accidentally murder your neighbors in this desperate hunt? Each of you will become one of the residents of the ill-fated town of Millers Hollow. Star-crossed lovers, the police captain, and the hunters can all help hunt down the wolves, with help from the town psychic and a particularly nosy little girl. Convince your friends that you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re human, or you may wind up lynched by the very townspeople you fight to protect. And if you actually are a werewolf, band with your fellow monsters to pick off the frightened townsfolk one by one, until the town belongs to you and you alone! The Werewolves of Millers Hollow is a party game for eight or more players. Featuring evocative art and social play, the game will have you bluffing, arguing and outright lying to cover up your identity and reveal the true monsters before you join their hideous ranks!
